import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBTabPane, MDBTabContent, MDBNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from '../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from '../components/sectionContainer'; class TabsPage extends Component { state = { activeItem: '1' }; toggle = tab => e => { if (this.state.activeItem !== tab) { this.setState({ activeItem: tab }); } }; render() { const { activeItem } = this.state; return ( Home Profile Profile
